sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>Fix script to delete preferences from empty users</description> <name>Delete empty ISC configs each upgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[// Delete User preferences where user or trend is empty var empty_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('appsec_isc_event_configuration'); empty_gr.addEncodedQuery('trendISEMPTY^NQuserISEMPTY'); empty_gr.deleteMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-01-31 21:26:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a0bbbede0dd32300964f37ce02614207</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete empty ISC configs each upgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Instance Security Center" source="com.glide.instance_sec_center">387a706c3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f96</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a0bbbede0dd32300964f37ce02614207</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-01-31 21:28:22</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete empty ISC configs each upgrade
